data.title: Purchase or Rent an Orthoscan TAU 1512 Mini C Arm
data.meta_description: The Orthoscan TAU 1512 is a leader in c arm fluoroscopy. Built to serve diverse scenarios needing extremity scans. Custom purchase or rental plans available
data.text:
The Orthoscan TAU 1512 sets a new benchmark with its cutting-edge features, delivering unmatched performance in fluoroscopic imaging. Boasting a next-generation 15 cm x 12 cm CMOS flat panel detector with an impressive 2.0 k x 1.5 k image resolution, this advanced device ensures unparalleled image clarity for precise diagnostics. With a remarkable 160 degrees of orbital rotation, the TAU 1512 provides medical teams with optimal views and an expansive field of vision, all while prioritizing patient comfort and eliminating the need for mechanical adjustments.

Exceptionally designed, the Orthoscan TAU 1512 supports both pediatric and adult patients, thanks to its optimized dose filter and overall ergonomic design. Its compact and lightweight form factor enables effortless maneuverability within rooms and throughout the facility, facilitating seamless transitions between procedures. Equipped with improved bilateral controls and impressive articulation capabilities, this Orthoscan mini c-arm offers enhanced maneuvering, making it easier than ever to navigate hallways and corners with its three-way brake control.

The Orthoscan TAU 1512’s user-centric design ensures streamlined operation and enhanced workflow efficiency. Surgical LED lights enhance visibility, delivering clear and precise fluoroscopy images for accurate diagnoses. With its 24-inch high-resolution monitor, the TAU 1512 offers a captivating display, allowing healthcare professionals to examine images with clarity. Powered by the Orthotouch™ 2.0 interface, this mini c-arm incorporates exciting technological features, providing a seamless and intuitive user experience.
